snippet: Trainers of Kentucky Derby horses say they will take their time in deciding whether to run the second leg of the Triple Crown.
abstract: Kentucky Derby winner I'll Have Another will be shipped to Baltimore to compete in the Preakness, the second leg of the Triple Crown; some trainers are contemplating whether to send their horse to the Preakness without a chance at Triple Crown.
lead_paragraph: Trainers of Kentucky Derby horses say they will take their time in deciding whether to run the second leg of the Triple Crown.

headline.seo: Kentucky Derby Trainers Are Cautious About Preakness
headline.main: Race to the Preakness Is Filled With Caution
headline.print_headline: Race to the Preakness Is Filled With Caution
